DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study develop pilot test culturally developmentally tailor Motivational Enhancement Intervention ( MEI ) reduce risky sex ( unprotected anal sex multiple partner ) among young Hispanic men sex men ( YHMSM ) .
DOC.brief_title: Motiv82Change : HIV Prevention Study Young Latino Men
DOC.detailed_description: Stage 1 , divide Stage 1a Stage 1b , focus development , refinement , pilot test intervention . The formative research lead include intervention development complete Stage 1a . A pilot study provide acceptability/feasibility data obtain effect size estimate intervention 's strength changing desire outcome conduct Stage 1b . If Stage 1b result `` promising , '' intervention move full scale efficacy test Stage 2 use classic experimental design randomize control trial ( RCT ) . The intervention ready Stage 3 effectiveness test efficacy demonstrate least two Stage 2 trial .
DOC.criteria: To eligible , participant must : 1. male ; 2. selfidentify Hispanic/Latino ; 3. 18 29 year age ; 4. live South Florida ; 5. least 1 episode unprotected anal sex man last 6 month ; 6. least 2 male sex partner last 6 month ; 7. HIV negative know HIV positive ; 8. previously participate study . 1. live HIV infection
